short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect what you have seen in Wiki

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is used for collecting text, images, new words, and notes from Wikiwand pages.  Currently not support original Wikipedia pages, Wikiwand extension is needed.

Page Shortcuts:
Alt + Q: open popup
Alt + W: open Wiki Collector page
Alt + `: add notes
Alt + 1: highlight selected content
Alt + click selected word: see definition
context menu: highlight selected content, save figure, collect page

Wiki Collector page:
Double click: edit notes
Left/Right click: see original size/delete saved figure
Support Export/Import collected data to .json file.
